default_permission.description:
This permission set configures the types of dialogs
available from the dialog plugin.

#### Granted Permissions

All dialog types are enabled.

allow-ask.description: Enables the ask command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-confirm.description: Enables the confirm command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-message.description: Enables the message command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-open.description: Enables the open command without any pre-configured scope.

allow-save.description: Enables the save command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-ask.description: Denies the ask command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-confirm.description: Denies the confirm command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-message.description: Denies the message command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-open.description: Denies the open command without any pre-configured scope.

deny-save.description: Denies the save command without any pre-configured scope.
